title: A Life Beyond Yesterday
description: Sometimes, even a Hollywood ending, isn't.Young mother and recent widow, Amelia Gauge, moves cross-country with her son in search of a new life in A Life Beyond Yesterday. She soon realizes that life outside of the Rural Midwest is filled with deceit, danger and, too rarely, kindness. Between falling in love and fighting for her life, will she be able to find a new, stronger version of herself before her new world comes crumbling down?
author: Clara LaVeaux
